name: A reaver's mandibles
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity nicely.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'critical'.
When threatened, the mandibles respond by spraying a numbing toxin.
